DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Adolescent Smoking Daily Quantity Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._Occurring or done each day._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.
